website_summaries.verdict: Ultimate in minimalism while still making a statement.
pros: Holds four rolls of any size, perfect for guest bathrooms
cons: Not for people with OCD, since the bottom roll sits off-center

customer_reviews.title: Holds 4 rolls.
customer_reviews.text: Hold 4 rolls of TP. Has some weight to it and design keeps rolls from touching floor. Easy enough to put rolls on or take them off. What you see is what you get and works just as expected. Design does remind me of a swimming sperm but i knew that going in and chose this design anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Holds 5 rolls
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I don't remember what it says it holds but I can get 5 rolls of toilet paper on it, 6 if I cover the top. It takes up very little room. With the toilet paper on it I can fit it between the toilet and the wall. (close quarters for my toilet room) And the rolls are easy to remove. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Paula McCallister

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have searched long and hard for a toliet paper holder that holds more than 3 rolls and finally found it with this! I buy cottonelle double roll toliet paper and I can fit 5 rolls!! No assembly necessary and good quality! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Odd Appearance
customer_reviews.text: When this holder is loaded with toilet paper rolls, the appearance is fine. By itself, however, it resembles a 2 foot tall futuristic chrome terminator sperm. It gets more than a few laughs when we have company.
customer_reviews.author: Elmore Crouch

customer_reviews.title: Great Toilet Paper Holder
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this toilet paper holder. It's so durable and sturdy. I love the chrome finish. It fits perfectly in the small space against the wall and the toilet in my bathroom. The fact that it holds up to 5 rolls of paper is definitely a plus. I never run out of paper. I even like to spiral design. It's definitely worth the price. I am pleased with my purchase. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: They do the job!
customer_reviews.text: These work great and I didnt have to assemble anything! I got one for both of our bathrooms because everyone in my house hold keeps forgetting to teplace the toilet paper when they use it all, lol. They do kinda look like a sperm but I am ok with it! Hehe
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this item. It works well, is sturdy and can hold 4 or possibly more rolls. The only thing I do not love about this is that the first roll does not sit flat, causing the second roll to not sit flat. Really more of an aesthetic issue, certainly does not affect the functionality of the item. It looks nice in the bathroom and matches well.
customer_reviews.author: litcoach1

customer_reviews.title: ... my bathroom for a shelf and this provided the perfect solution. Just the right size and well made
customer_reviews.text: I do not have enough room in my bathroom for a shelf and this provided the perfect solution. Just the right size and well made. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Todd A. Danner

customer_reviews.title: No assembly required!
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfectly in the space between the sink vanity and the toilet tank. Rolls are easy to add and remove.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: This did not match up with my previous purchase. The one I just received is not of the same quality as the other three I received and is smaller. Not happy with purchase, since it does not even match the picture displayed.
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet paper holder
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed to fit in the corner of my bathroom to hold my toilet paper instead of the bottom shelf of my cabinet. This way I don't have to lean down and dig the rolls out of the cabinet anymore!
customer_reviews.author: gbbrown

customer_reviews.title: Fits all roll sizes
customer_reviews.text: Just the right thing to hold those stupid mega rolls of toilet paper! We can’t buy a normal sized toilet paper so I had to get this instead. Works great!!! The funky design makes me laugh too.
customer_reviews.author: P. Starling

customer_reviews.title: Unique toilet tissue holder
customer_reviews.text: Cool funky toilet tissue roll. Comes preassembled out of the box, easy to use. Saves us space from putting the rolls directly oh the floor. Love that it holds 5 rolls! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea49

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea for toilet paper storage
customer_reviews.text: There isn't much I can say about the features or characteristics of this product, it is good quality, sturdy and does what it is suppose to do. Holds 5 roles.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend this holder!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 of the jumbo toliet paper rolls on this holder. It is steady and secure and does not topple over. I am ordering another one for another bathroom. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but needs work
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have with this holder is that the first roll on this stand will touch the ground. It strikes me as unsanitary
customer_reviews.author: Buck Larou

customer_reviews.title: A nice addition to the bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: I love that it keeps the paper handy. It will actually hold 5 rolls.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of toilet paper.
customer_reviews.text: I like that this takes up little room yet holds up to five rolls of toilet paper. Interesting design.
customer_reviews.author: Carol K.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing wrong with it
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with it. But the design on top looks like a sperm. Very stupid design
customer_reviews.author: kendra renn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing to it, just put toilet paper rolls on. Lol. I put five rolls on mine. And it's not an eye sore or a bulky product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M.

customer_reviews.title: TP Holder
customer_reviews.text: I really don't know why I was supposed to give stars for "softness". It's metal. It holds toilet paper.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Williams

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: matches everything, great way to bring a bit of whimsicalness into your more sophisticated design.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Modern Metal Toilet Paper Holder
customer_reviews.text: Great, modern toilet paper holder. Holds 3 or 4 rolls depending on how much of the stand you want to see. Sturdy metal. Doesn't take up much room.
customer_reviews.author: kykim41042

customer_reviews.title: Toilet tissue holder
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product. It is sturdy and has a modern style. I can put 5 mega rolls on it. It is easy to take the rolls off of it and to put it on. The price is right. There’s not much else to say except that I’m thinking of purchasing another.
customer_reviews.author: Advisor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: It does what its suppose to do and not fall down.
customer_reviews.author: branchc

customer_reviews.title: Great product for any roll
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as our old one wouldn’t fit the rolls we buy without squishing them. It holds 5 rolls and if you want to balance a 6th you can.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I like my TP holder, it's cute and all, but I wouldnt buy this exact one again. They need to put some sort of cross bar at the bottom of the paper holding rod because after you slide 6 rolls onto this holder, the TP rolls tends to slide down and get mushed at the bottom. I have seen others that feature the design that im talking about, other than that, it's pretty and does its job!
customer_reviews.author: A. Reiss

customer_reviews.title: I have two of these
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine piece to hold your TP in a smallish bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Norma Smith-Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet paper holder/stand!
customer_reviews.text: I was fed up with running out of toilet paper and not having any spare rolls within reach, so I searched high and low for a nice, classy, durable toilet paper holder or stand. There were not many to choose from out there, but this one looked nice, so I gave it a try. It is a nice, modern, high quality product and it goes well with our bathroom. I have been able to get 5-6 large rolls of toilet paper on it and have not been stuck without a roll since! Great item!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Find!!
customer_reviews.text: This free standing toilet paper holder is perfect for the small space between the vanity cabinet and the toilet--any other style toilet paper holder would not fit. It's stylish and functional. So glad I found it!
customer_reviews.author: ILoveMovies

customer_reviews.title: Great storage, small footprint
customer_reviews.text: This holds 6 rolls of larger sized rolls. Tucks in next to the toilet in my tiny bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: interDesign Orbinni Metal Toilet Tissue Roll Reserve
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, holds 5 rolls, any size. Easy on, easy off.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Cooper

customer_reviews.title: It was a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: It was what I expected and it fits well into the small space in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: J Miracle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this product, its simple and elegant, unobtrusive and works great!
customer_reviews.author: BOB

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but toilet rolls do not stay off the floor
customer_reviews.text: The design feature that is made to keep the rolls off the floor simply doesn't work when you account for the weight of the toilet tissue. An empty roll at the base kept the remaining ones off the floor. It looks nice and serves our bathroom storage limitations.
customer_reviews.author: knittingmami

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I read the other reviews before buying and this fits in my space perfectly. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bev Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Modern design and fits well in a corner and can hold 5 rolls.
customer_reviews.author: LJP

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: This holds the toilet paper like it’s supposed to. Actually holds five rolls. However, I can’t help to think of sperm every time I look at it.
customer_reviews.author: Wine lover

customer_reviews.title: Nifty
customer_reviews.text: It holds toilet paper and looks cool. That’s about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: 2 Stars cause the TP can almost touch the ground.
customer_reviews.text: When you load it up with a few rolls the bottom roll gets pushed all the way down and almost touches the ground. Besides that. It's a metal rod that holds TP.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Schrader

customer_reviews.title: Effective holder
customer_reviews.text: This toilet paper holder is handy and adds a bit of interest to the toilet room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Toilet Paper Caddy
customer_reviews.text: Great toilet paper caddy, perfect for storage of additional toilet paper and excellent sleek, space saving design.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Kind of funky looking. but is nice quality and fits the large rolls of toilet paper I use.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Flamingo

customer_reviews.title: TOILET PAPER ROLL RESERVE HOLDER
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I wanted. It can & does hold any size toilet paper. It doesn't matter if it is a single roll, double, triple or even bigger size. It accommodates them all. Therefore you don't have to worry that if you buy a larger size roll it won't fit. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Lammy

customer_reviews.title: problem
customer_reviews.text: ok, it is well made and sturdy, and it is a handy way to store toilet paper. Also, it looks good- without toilet paper on it. However, because of its design, with toilet paper on it it looks like a mess. The roll closest to the floor will always be twisted to the side. I guess I was hoping for it not only to keep the bathroom organized but to look good at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Gryphon50

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my small 1/2 bath
customer_reviews.text: out of the way small and discrete but very cool
customer_reviews.author: Sandib52

customer_reviews.title: Fashion and function
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for any size roll. Fits perfectly next to toilet. Looks decorative
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: We always use the super big rolls of TP, and this is perfect for those--holds up to five. It's nice looking and inexpensive. What's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: JLH

customer_reviews.title: Function meets Art
customer_reviews.text: Interdesign 68600 toilet paper reserve holder is practicle but classy,looks good and not much space needed in the bathroom.My wife loves her's.
customer_reviews.author: drednot

customer_reviews.title: Simple, elegant, and does the job
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something not too frou frou but rather simple, elegant and practical. This fit the bill nicely.
customer_reviews.author: GisliNM

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: this product exceded my expectations - I am moving to a smaller place with a very small bathroom and wanted something not only to hold the toilet paper but to keep it off the ground and this is a beautifully stylized product that will work perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what you’d expect
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this, it turned out to be 20 lbs of wood chips. Now, that’s amazon’s fault, but it meant I wasn’t prepared to cut it a lot of slack after going through the process of returning 20 lbs of wood chips and waiting for the replacement. It came requiring assembly - I had to screw the little knob onto the end - but the threads are squashed so it doesn’t fit flush. Apart from that it is what I expected it to be and it holds 5 rolls of toilet paper safely off the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to keep spare rolls in the bathroom since we have no form of storage in the bathrooms. It's cute and quirky, and does its job. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: sixstories

customer_reviews.title: Bottom roll gets crushed...
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay but, wouldn’t order again. As said in other reviews the bottom roll is always crushed. Honestly this was an accidental purchase by accidentally pushing the order now button. Haha spend a few more bucks and get the one with the bendable arm that holds the roll.
customer_reviews.author: pdfoxx

customer_reviews.title: Smart and functional
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, make good use of that unused space in the corner of the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kennett

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I love how it looks and the quality of it. I needed one that didn't take up too much space on the floor, since I have a very small bathroom, and this is just perfect. And a bonus is that there is no installation or screwing and tightening or any of that annoying stuff! You just take it out of the package and put it where you want it. Did I mention I love this thing?!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Rudesal

customer_reviews.title: It's quirky
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these to put ribbon rolls on for my sewing room. Because of the curves in the rod they don't slide down evenly but I don't mind. I think it makes them more interesting. Not sure if I'd want my TP rolls to be like that, but it's a matter of preference.
customer_reviews.author: RaZ

customer_reviews.title: Works well but....
customer_reviews.text: Product is well made, durable and of quality metal; but some that have seen it in my bathroom have mentioned it looks like a swimming sperm. I agree in hindsight it kind of does. Just keep this in mind if are mulling this item. I fixed this by always keeping new rolls piled up above the tip.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based on the reviews I read. Absolutely perfect and just what I was hoping for so thank you to all the very accurate and informative reviews. For me 5 rolls fit on at one time. No assembly required. It is new to our house but feels sturdy and well made. Placing it on the floor of the bathroom was certainly an easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: arbu1

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy again
customer_reviews.text: A little wobbly but hasn't tipped over. Holds 5 rolls of you don't care about seeing the little knob on top. I like it because it doesn't take up a lot of space and your guests don't have to go digging around in your cabinets if the roll runs out
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this toilet paper holder. It's exactly as pictured. It's the smallest, most modern, least invasive toilet paper holder out there. I just purchased another one now that we have more than 1 bathroom. As mentioned in another review, the first one I bought, the toilet roll on the very bottom did sit a bit sideways. They've obviously improved the design, because the one I just bought, the bottom roll sits flat. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Grey

customer_reviews.title: Serves It's Purpose but disappointing
customer_reviews.text: A bit disappointing but it serves it's purpose. I hate the way the bottom roll sits and touches the floor which is a bit ick to me but my gloor is clean so no huge deal I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Ekesha Guillory

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for storing extra toilet. Paper rolls.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a taller toilet paper holder to use in our camper. That way I wouldn’t have to store it anywhere else. It worked perfectly. I can fit five rolls on it and one on the dispenser. Plus it’s pretty! No rust either
customer_reviews.author: TTNelson

customer_reviews.title: SPERM!
customer_reviews.text: This toilet paper holder does its job. It is sturdy and won't fall over easily or anything.... it does however look like a giant sperm! Conversation starter I suppose!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Laudati

customer_reviews.title: Completely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Just looked for a simple piece for a bathroom with literally zero storage. It’s solid enough not to tip over any time it’s touched, and not so over the top to be weird to be using in a bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: MrsK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. I have a tiny bathroom and use it on the side of my toilet where there is only about 6 inches between the toilet and the wall. It is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tevis

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet paper holder
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why softness was something to be rated on since the object was metal. No, not soft. I already had one of these and they are great. Holds at least 4 rolls.
customer_reviews.author: Cam Walton

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet paper holder
customer_reviews.text: Functional in holding multiple rolls. Happy with the buy. Update: I ended up buying another one for my second bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: The Shaster

customer_reviews.title: Solved my problem
customer_reviews.text: Tried several designs and this one finally solved my problem in a tiny bathroom. Even holds more rolls.

customer_reviews.title: bent when I got it
customer_reviews.text: was bent when I got it... I kind of bend it back to shape but doesn’t really stand... I have to lean it against the wall

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my trailer fits great holds 5 It fits perfectly in the small bathroom

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: You can fit 5 or 6 rolls at a time so you don’t have to refill as often as others. Item is just as pictured. No assembly required

customer_reviews.title: Nice tissue holder
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, contemporary toilet paper holder. My only complaint is that the bottom roll sits slightly off-center because of the curve in the wire.

customer_reviews.title: TP When & Where You Need It
customer_reviews.text: This holds 5 rolls so you don't get caught running out! Sturdy base and easily fits into a small corner

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm able to fit 5 mega charmin rolls on this item and it does its job well

customer_reviews.title: Impractical design
customer_reviews.text: It's cool looking on it's own but the shape makes the toilet paper fit unevenly and chaotically. It looks like a house Dr. Suess might have built.

customer_reviews.title: Very Stylish & Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these in both of my bathrooms. They are great value for money and are so stylish and contemporary. I love them and visitors often comment on how unusual they are. They do start to develop some rust spots after about 12 to 18 mths but these come off quiet easily with some regular household cleaner and a scourer which makes them look like new again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Herman

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I needed a toilet paper holder for the bathroom off the family room. I love the whimsical look.

customer_reviews.title: it's okay

customer_reviews.title: I love this TP holder
customer_reviews.text: I love this TP holder! It fits well in the small toilet area (or coffin) of my bathroom & it looks great. It's made nicely & strong enough for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Cynth

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, holds more rolls than I thought it would, yet doesn't take up a lot of room. Not sure it's the right style for my bathroom which is kind of Cap Cod and this seems more modern.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Tube on bottom gets bent out of shape and becomes difficult to bend back and doesn't unroll well on toilet paper holder. Otherwise, it looks great and its what I wanted.

customer_reviews.text: Great product overall, better that what you find in the stores, even though it is a bit taller than I would have liked and sometimes the bottom roll gets a bit wedged at the bottom.

customer_reviews.text: Great for my bathroom and fits in a variety of spots. I am so glad I got this!

customer_reviews.text: Nice, convenient and has good quality! Bought two of those.

customer_reviews.title: Anyway it works out great for me
customer_reviews.text: It does sort of look a little sperm-y on top there, doesn't it? Anyway it works out great for me. No more piles of TP on the back of the toilet or the floor in our tiny, clustered bathroom. Thanks!

product_meta.title: iDesign Orbinni Metal Toilet Tissue Roll Reserve for Bathroom, Compact Squiggle Organizer Caddy, Holds 4 Rolls of Paper, Chrome
product_meta.description:
The iDesign Orbinni Toilet Roll Stand is the stylish and practical bathroom accessory you have been searching for. This organizer allows you to store 4 extra rolls of toilet paper all in one convenient place. The free standing design is compact and easy to fit in any space, whether it be in the corner of the room or between a sink and toilet. The chrome silver finish on the canister will fit in with any decor while the squiggle design adds fun to your bathroom. Constructed of durable steel, this stand is sure to last for years to come. Measuring 6.5" x 24.7", the iDesign Orbinni Roll Stand will provide the organization you dream of in your bathroom.

With iDesign by InterDesign, you can #LiveSimply every day.
feature_bullets: FUNCTIONAL TOILET PAPER HOLDER: Sturdy toilet tissue holder holds up to 3 rolls of toilet paper on a center pole. Slim design to fit in your closet, bathroom, or next to the toilet. Perfect for master bathroom, guest bathroom, kid's bathroom, or RV
CONVENIENT: Toilet paper organizer holds up to 4 rolls to always keep toilet paper close at hand
DURABLE: High-quality steel construction for extended use
STYLISH: Chrome finish looks great with any décor. Squiggle design adds a touch of whimsy
IDEAL SIZE: Toilet paper organizer measures 6.5" x 24.7" to fit between your toilet and the counter or wall

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars460 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
